page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN HARPUR HILL
page.content:
{ Right in the north east corner of our area there is a new industrial estate. It is on the A515 to Ashbourne, near to the cemetery. It is about 2 miles from the centre of Buxton, covers{31 acres and employs about{500}people.
It was started in 1965 by{Brake {Linings Ltd.}There are two chemical companies on the estate.{Selden {Research Ltd}manufacture maintenance chemicals and are planning to double the size of their factory.{Lea Ronal part of a multinational company which makes chemcials which are used in electroplating items ranging from kitchen taps to jewellery and printed circuit boards.
